title: Independence Day for Grassy Gulch
description: Celebrate Independence Day!Jake is a young Minecraft villager living in the village of Grassy Gulch. He doesn't think much about history or his village traditions. He'd rather read a Baby Zeke Diary. But, when his grandfather tells him the truth behind Grassy Gulch's struggle for freedom, he comes to understand the value of the past and of tradition.No matter where you live in the world, this book will make you cheer for the citizens of Grassy Gulch!***This book is NOT OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.
author: Dr. Block
